SELECT b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes l WHERE l.board_no = b.board_no) as likesCnt, r.report_status as "boardReport.reportStatus" FROM board b RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, report_status FROM board_report GROUP BY board_no, report_status ORDER BY board_no DESC ) r ON b.board_no = r.board_no ORDER BY b.board_no DESC
